content: Are people allowed to attend just as an interested audience member, or are submissions required to be able to go the conference?
A message was moved here from #announce > UNSOUND Workshop at ECOOP 2026 by Floris van Doorn.

I don't know this workshop, but there are almost no workshops where a submission is required to attend. There might be a registration fee for the workshop (this information will hopefully be put on the workshop webpage).
